meanings.sent1: The movie was so samey, with no exciting twists or surprises.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe was full of samey outfits, all in shades of gray.
meanings.sent3: The samey pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel like a never-ending maze.
meanings.sent4: The samey rhythm of the clock ticking echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The samey taste of the plain oatmeal was a daily disappointment.
